answer:
Please contact a local health unit and ask to speak to a Public Health Nurse who can review your immunization history to see if you qualify for publicly funded (free) vaccine. If not, you may purchase MMR vaccine from a pharmacy or travel clinic. You can find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Please contact a local health unit and ask to speak to a Public Health Nurse who can review your immunization history to see if you qualify for publicly funded (free) vaccine.


## If not, you may purchase MMR vaccine from a pharmacy or travel clinic.

You can find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hello, I am not a current resident of BC, and have an out-of-province health card. Can I still get the free MMR vaccine? MMR vaccines are free in my province too.
question_variation_0: is the cmr vaccine free in bc
question_variation_1: is mmr vaccine free in bc
question_variation_2: can i still get mmr vaccine in bc
